Articles.Content: So, I had a modded install, but after this crash I manually scrubbed the entire kerbal folder, and uninstalled from steam, then re installed and then verified the cache...still crashing at startup with no mods installed.
So the launcher doesn't work, and the 32 bit program doesn't either, but the 64 bit program does..wth?
Please see the support stickies, we'll need to see your logs ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
